description.displayText: Tashi is the best, most caring, wonderful woman who could ever care for a family and especially young children. She was there for my kids from the time my youngest son was an infant and his brother was just under 18 months old. She worked for me for 5 years and was always there for my kids - morning, noon and night. No task, no need, no snack nor meal was ever missed by Tashi especially when it came to keeping my kids, happy, active, well rested, playful and educated at a young age. I highly recommend Tashi as a nanny, caregiver, a babysitter or any other job that requires love and devotion to a family.

I highly recommend Tashi as a nanny, caregiver, a babysitter or any other job that requires love and devotion to a family.

description.displayText: Tashi worked as our nanny about 5 years ago to take care of our daughter. She was very caring and loving to our child. She followed whatever directions/instructions we gave her. She was also resourceful in finding activities for our daughter.  Unfortunately, her services were no longer needed as I decided to stay home to take care of our child. We still consider Tashi a part of our family and keep in touch with her.
